name: Category
comment: note: species order != pokedex order; some species are dummies and a few have multiple copies for different “forms”.

name: Height
comment: There is a table that maps species index to pokedex index -- not a pointer table, just, table[i] is the pokedex entry for species #I

name: Weight
comment: Not sure how to handle this yet. Table is at 0x1fc516 in original rom (and second table at 0x1fc1e0?). rev 2 rom is probably different
